itunes:title: Mini Show #9: Jon Stewart, Senate Democrats, CNN vs Bernie, Cancel Culture, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: In this compilation of bonus segments, Krystal and Saagar talk about Jon Stewart's appearance on CNN, why Democrats should force a vote in the Senate, CNN's attacks on Bernie Sanders, cancel culture, and more!
